actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Air Force to purchase the mobile homes of certain members of the Air Force stationed at Pease Air Force Base, New Hampshire.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Air Force to purchase from members of the Air Force and their spouses mobile homes located on the base mobile home park at Pease Air Force Base, New Hampshire, on January 1, 1989, and not moved from there since that time. Outlines provisions concerning: (1) the amount of payment; (2) the disposal of mobile homes purchased; (3) funding for payments from the Department of Defense Base Closure Account; and (4) reports to the Congress.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Air Force to purchase the mobile homes of certain members of the Air Force stationed at Pease Air Force Base, New Hampshire.
